name: Oliver Barrett
summary: Oliver Barrett, a 32-year-old straight man located in Los Angeles, California, is looking for a long-term, monogamous relationship. He is a software engineer who values honesty, creativity, and continual learning. Apart from coding, his interests include visual arts and hiking. He identifies as a white Caucasian with agnostic beliefs and moderate political views. Oliver speaks both English and Spanish, does not have any children but aims for some in the future. His serious approach towards health is apparent from his active lifestyle, occasional drinking habits, and a no to smoking as well as any kind of drug use. ILegal or otherwise. His ideal match is a straight woman aged between 27 and 36, who preferably does not have any kids at present but desires to have them, doesn't smoke and also maintains an active lifestyle. As for the drinking habits and choosing to use marijuana or not, Oliiver seems pretty open-minded.
